## ASTCapability interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Capability object for AST-based analysis.

Plugins can implement this to provide AST-aware functionality.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ASTCapability 
```

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** Applies a policy to classify API changes.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[compareModules(oldAnalysis, newAnalysis)](./change-detector-core.astcapability.comparemodules.md)


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** Compares two module analyses and returns structural changes.
